Acute Species Sensitivity Data as compiled in 2025

envirotox_25_acute.Rd

Acute species sensitivity data from Envirotox (Connors et al. 2019)

Usage

envirotox_25_acute

Format

An object of class tbl_df (inherits from tbl, data.frame) with 10833 rows and 9 columns.

References

Connors, K.A., Beasley, A., Barron, M.G., Belanger, S.E., Bonnell, M., Brill, J.L., de Zwart, D., Kienzler, A., Krailler, J., Otter, R., Phillips, J.L., and Embry, M.R. 2019. Creation of a Curated Aquatic Toxicology Database: EnviroTox. Enviro Toxic and Chemistry 38(5): 1062–1073. doi:10.1002/etc.4382.

Examples


head(envirotox_25_acute)
#> # A tibble: 6 × 9
#>   Chemical  Conc Species                 Type  Medium   Group Class Family Units
#>   <chr>    <dbl> <chr>                   <chr> <chr>    <chr> <chr> <chr>  <chr>
#> 1 100005     4.9 Chlorella pyrenoidosa   Acute Freshwa… Algae Chlo… Oocys… mg/L 
#> 2 100005    14   Danio rerio             Acute Freshwa… Fish  Acti… Cypri… mg/L 
#> 3 100005     2.7 Daphnia magna           Acute Freshwa… Inve… Bran… Daphn… mg/L 
#> 4 100005     8   Desmodesmus subspicatus Acute Freshwa… Algae Chlo… Scene… mg/L 
#> 5 100005     6.6 Poecilia reticulata     Acute Freshwa… Fish  Acti… Poeci… mg/L 
#> 6 100005    74.4 Tetrahymena pyriformis  Acute Freshwa… Inve… Cili… Tetra… mg/L
